meanings: the inside, within, within the scope of (=안1)

vlive.korean: 내 꿈 꿔요 안녕! Dream about me! Bye! 듣기 View video ITZY : 믿잠브🤟🏻♥️
"언니 요즘 내 꿈에 왜 이렇게 많이 나와요?" "Why do you appear on my dream so often"? 듣기 View video TWICE : 헤헤헤헤
vlive.english: "Why do you appear on my dream so often"?

vlive.korean: "유나 내 꿈에 나왔었어" 어떻게 나왔었어요? "YUNA, you were in my dream". How was she? 듣기 View video ITZY : ❤️
vlive.english: "YUNA, you were in my dream". How was she?

vlive.korean: 연기가 인생의 전부가 아니... - 내 꿈을 위해서! Acting isn't everything in life... - For my dream! 듣기 View video 컨버전스티비 (CONS TV) : [커먼스쿨]리라아트고등학교 ep9(홍현희X정세운X김수용)
vlive.english: Acting isn't everything in life... - For my dream!

vlive.korean: 어제 네가 내 꿈에 나타났다는 뜻이에요. and it's about when you had a dream of someone you like. 듣기 View video V INDONESIA : SOHEE X JUN CHEF COOKING SPECIAL LIVE
vlive.english: and it's about when you had a dream of someone you like.

examples.korean: In my dream all my toys came to life. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 꿈속에서는 내 장난감들이 모두 살아서 움직였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In my dream all my toys came to life. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My dream is to retire to a villa in France. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 꿈은 은퇴해서 프랑스에 있는 빌라에 가서 사는 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My dream is to retire to a villa in France. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: the vividness of my dream 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 꿈의 생생함 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the vividness of my dream Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Quitting my job to chase my dream of opening my own restaurant was the best decision I’ve ever made. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나만의 식당을 열겠다는 내 꿈을 쫓기 위해 일을 그만둔 건 내가 한 결정 중에 최고의 결정이었어. DARAKWON
examples.english: Quitting my job to chase my dream of opening my own restaurant was the best decision I’ve ever made. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My dream has finally come true; I’ve published my first book! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 꿈이 드디어 이루어졌어. 첫 책을 냈어! DARAKWON
examples.english: My dream has finally come true; I’ve published my first book! Add to Wordbook
